name: DBUG
description:
DBUG

After your door crashes, it's up to you to figure out why.

You go to leave through the hallway but it appears that whoever programmed the universe screwed up, and  then the adventure begins.


How to play:

WASD - Move
Move Camera - Move Mouse
F - Interact

Escape - Pause Menu

Made by a team of 5 people in 7 days
